detectors.description:

detectors.description: LAZARUSTokenSale.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LAZARUSTokenSale.sol#86-104) ignores return value by Token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LAZARUSTokenSale.sol#103)

LAZARUSTokenSale.contribute() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LAZARUSTokenSale.sol#107-125) ignores return value by Token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LAZARUSTokenSale.sol#124)

LAZARUSTokenSale.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LAZARUSTokenSale.sol#86-104) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(startDate > 0 && now.sub(startDate) <= 604800) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LAZARUSTokenSale.sol#87)
	- now.sub(startDate) <= 86400 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LAZARUSTokenSale.sol#92)
	- now.sub(startDate) > 86400 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LAZARUSTokenSale.sol#94)

Variable LAZARUSTokenSale.Token (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LAZARUSTokenSale.sol#72) is not in mixedCase
